typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		{Attribute 1 Name} as string,
		{Product Hierarchy Code} as string,
		Area as string,
		{Time Name} as string,
		{Volume Sales (MSU)} as string,
		{Category Volume Share} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
